contest-event.event-date:
July 1, 2001 D Brighouse March & Hymn Tune
Brighouse March & Hymn Tune Contest 0 March & Hymn Contest
brighouse-march-hymn-tune
Brighouse, West Yorkshire Hymn tune - Hepworth. March on street - Thoresby. Deportment - West Yorks Police. Best section 1 - Lindley. Best section 2 Royal Buckley. Best section 3 - West Yorks Police. Best section 4 - Clifton and Lightcliffe. Best youth - Shaw. 2nd annual contest. 24 bands competed.
Dec. 11, 2011, 6:22 p.m. Sept. 15, 2015, 3:56 p.m.
1 Hepworth Band Alan Lawton
2 Lindley Band Neil Jowett
3 Sellers International Alan Exley
Unknown Result Clifton and Lightcliffe Band Rob Collinson
Unknown Result Royal Buckley Town Band Gareth Thomas
Unknown Result Shaw Youth Band Ted Tooley
Unknown Result Thoresby Colliery Stan Lippeatt
Unknown Result West Yorkshire Police Band Barry Thompson
